caption.p: Postmortem lung biopsy of a 28 year old male patient with acute myocardial infarction and aortic stenosis as control subject. The bronchiole without viral particles. The pictures of the electron microscopy panels ( A, B) were made at 25,000× and 50,000× respectively with a Jeol JEM-1011 electronic microscope. Abbreviations: C = cellule, CM = cellular membrane.
